## Instructions

This report is about the population of the city of Beijing and Shanghai in China, which is demonstrated by the Circle Sizes.



```{r data, echo=FALSE}
### Create a dataset on the two cities' population. 
pdata <- data.frame(city = c('Beijing', 'Shanghai'), population = c(1500, 2100), Latitude = c(39.55, 31.22), Longitude = c(+116.24, +121.48))
```

### The map
```{r map, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
map <- pdata %>% leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lat = pdata$Latitude, lng = pdata$Longitude, popup = paste(pdata$city, '<br>Population:', formatC(pdata$population, format ='d', big.mark = ','))) %>% addCircles(lat = pdata$Latitude, lng = pdata$Longitude, weight =1, radius = pdata$population*100)
map
```
